Protocols/CommunicationTokenCredential.h.name: token(completionHandler:)
Protocols/CommunicationTokenCredential.h.abstract: Retrieve an access token from the credential.

Protocols/CommunicationTokenCredential.h.name: CommunicationTokenCredential
Protocols/CommunicationTokenCredential.h.abstract: Protocol defining the shape of credentials used with Azure Communication Services.

Protocols.html#/c:@M@AzureCommunication@.name: CommunicationIdentifier
Protocols.html#/c:@M@AzureCommunication@.abstract: Common Communication Identifier protocol for all Azure Communication Services. All Communication Identifiers conform to this protocol.

Classes/CommunicationUserCredential.html.name: init(token:)
Classes/CommunicationUserCredential.html.abstract: Creates a static CommunicationUserCredential object from the provided token.

Classes/CommunicationUserCredential.html.name: init(initialToken:refreshProactively:tokenRefresher:)
Classes/CommunicationUserCredential.html.abstract: Creates a CommunicationUserCredential that automatically refreshes the token.

Classes/CommunicationUserCredential.html.name: token(completionHandler:)
Classes/CommunicationUserCredential.html.abstract: Retrieve an access token from the credential.

Classes/CommunicationUserCredentialPolic.name: init(credential:)
Classes/CommunicationUserCredentialPolic.abstract: Creates a credential policy that authenticates requests using the provided CommunicationUserCredential.

Classes/CommunicationUserCredentialPolic.name: authenticate(request:completionHandler:)
Classes/CommunicationUserCredentialPolic.abstract: Authenticates an HTTP PipelineRequest with a token retrieved from the credential.

Classes/CommunicationUserCredential.html.name: CommunicationUserCredential
Classes/CommunicationUserCredential.html.abstract: The Azure Communication Services User token credential. This class is used to cache/refresh the access token required by Azure Communication Services.

Classes/UnknownIdentifier.html.name: UnknownIdentifier
Classes/UnknownIdentifier.html.abstract: Catch-all for all other Communication identifiers for Communication Services

Classes/PhoneNumber.html.name: PhoneNumber
Classes/PhoneNumber.html.abstract: Communication identifier for Communication Services representing a Phone Number

Typealiases.html.name: Type Aliases
Typealiases.html.abstract: The following type aliases are available globally.
